mapper.sql: track_record_id, student_id, track_record_title, track_record_content, track_record_time, enrollment, next_record_time
mapper.select: select x.*,y.data_content from (select a.staff_name,b.student_name,c.* from staff_info a,student_info b,track_record_info c where a.staff_id = b.staff_id and b.student_id=c.student_id and c.track_record_id = #{trackRecordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}) x left join data_dictionary y on x.enrollment = y.data_id
mapper.insert: insert into track_record_info (track_record_id, student_id, track_record_title, track_record_content, track_record_time, enrollment, next_record_time) values (#{trackRecordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trackRecordTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trackRecordContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trackRecordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enrollment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nextRecordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into track_record_info
track_record_id,
student_id,
track_record_title,
track_record_content,
track_record_time,
enrollment,
next_record_time,

mapper.update:
update track_record_info
student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
track_record_title = #{trackRecordTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
track_record_content = #{trackRecordContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
track_record_time = #{trackRecordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
enrollment = #{enrollment,jdbcType=INTEGER},
next_record_time = #{nextRecordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where track_record_id = #{trackRecordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update track_record_info set student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, track_record_title = #{trackRecordTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, track_record_content = #{trackRecordContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, track_record_time = #{trackRecordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, enrollment = #{enrollment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, next_record_time = #{nextRecordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where track_record_id = #{trackRecordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
